mapper.insert: insert into post (title, content, type) values (#{title},#{content},#{type})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id "p_id", p.title "p_title", p.content "p_content", p.regdate "p_regdate", p.isfinish "p_isfinish", u.id "u_id", u.username "u_username", u.password "u_password", u.name "u_name", u.juminno "u_juminno", u.regdate "u_regdate" FROM post p, user u WHERE p.user_id = u.id AND p.id = 1
